column4: i think it does not have like the compiz themes, or window managers or something...

should i have any beryl-* commands in the shell in 7.10?
because i dont have! and i dont have window decorators
emerald is not installed by default, we use gtk-window-decorator
ok, in which packages, are the compiz fusion themes? and window managers?
We don't have the emerald themes packaged
It's just 5 themes with a million variations
The decorators are in compiz-gnome, compiz-kde, and emerald
i dont have any, at least it's what i think this problem it's.
